trait.name: Inspiring Presence
entries: Creatures of Forfallen's choice (excluding herself) in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from her have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls. She can't use this trait if she has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Forfallen has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Forfallen makes three attacks, using Greataxe or Handaxe in any combination.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) Slashing damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d6 + 5}) Slashing damage.
